title: Nukeproof MegaWatt motorizes a 170mm travel mullet enduro e-bike
content:
Better late than never, right? Nukeproof have finally joined the revolution, motorizing the Mega to bring enduro fans the MegaWatt; a 170mm travel mullet eMTB. And, it looks just like a Mega. Save for the massive downtube and the Shimano STEPS EP8 motor molded into the bottom bracket, that is. Here are the fine details, [â€¦]

The post Nukeproof MegaWatt motorizes a 170mm travel mullet enduro e-bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
